name: My day At The Dungeon With Grandpa
name_original: My day At The Dungeon With Grandpa
description:
There is a big baddie that appeared in a cave near your village! It is up to you and your family to slay the monster(s) and restore peace for the younger generation. 


Keyboard Controls:  
W A S D = Movement                                          
Spacebar = Melee Attack
ESC = Pause / Unpause Game

Mouse Controls:
Point and Left Click = Projectile (Shoot)

This is a mini dungeon crawler,  you will experience two type of enemies and a boss! 
If your player's health reaches 0, the next generation will takes the elders place and continue to defeat the monsters. The fallen elders will live on as ghosts in the cave, providing help for the rest of your journey (Ghost NPC Shoots at the bad guys).  

Tip! Once you get comfortable with the controls, try to master slashing the boss' projectiles. The truly skilled will be able to deflect any boss bullets. Good luck and save the new generation! 

This was part of Game-U's 2020 game jam. It was a 48 Hour jam (10/23/2020 - 10/25/2020).
Team: New York
Theme: New Generation
Team Members:
Project Manager/Designer: Clint Magzul
Lead Programmer/Designer: Shawn Nenos
Lead Artist/Level Designer: Eric Elias
Programmer/Artist/Designer: Benjamin Amkhanitsky
Sound Designer/ Artist/ Designer: Greg Lyons
Sound Designer/ Programmer: Melina Mitchell 
Concept Artist / UI Artist/ Designer : Ted Agriogianis
